means: 可憎的，讨厌的，令人作呕的

sentence.Network_en: Herr Schmidt is certainly the most odious man I have ever met.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫尔·施密特无疑是我见过的最让人作呕的人。
真是个讨厌透顶的家伙！

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... odium 憎恨 odious 可憎的 petroleum 石油.
以o开头的英语英文单词 ... ode 长诗，颂歌 odious 可憎的，讨厌的 odium 憎恶，反感.
【巧记】和特（te）丑恶的（odious）无嘴（o）人在一起是极其乏味（tedious）的。  　　【猜一猜】① tediously ② tediousness  　　【Key …
...如希拉里所提到的，更为极端的，在乌干达最近被提出的令人作呕（odious）的法案之中”。

list.abs: many younger Chinese must embarrassing that Beijing is propping up such an odious regime .中国许多年轻人肯定对北京方面扶持这样一个可恶的政权感到难堪。
fourth Self : I , amongst you all , am the most miserable , for naught was given me but the odious hatred and destructive loathing .第四个自我说：我，与你们相比，算是最悲惨的，我别无选择，只有仇恨和嫌恶。
在转型到*政治的时期，舆论曾表达强烈的反对看法，包括从道德和法制观点，认为这些债务是“恶债”（odious debt），刚获解放的人民不应被迫承担压迫者与制造痛苦者的账单。反对声浪在南锥尤其强烈，因为有太多外债在*统治.
This place has an odious smell ; something must be rotten ., 这个地方有一股臭味 , 一定有东西腐烂了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French odieus, from Latin odiosus, from odium 'hatred'

entry.tran: 令人厌恶的；令人讨厌的；可憎的
entry.def: If you describe people or things as odious, you think that they are extremely unpleasant.

example.ex: Herr Schmidt is certainly the most odious man I have ever met...
example.tran: 赫尔·施密特无疑是我见过的最让人作呕的人。

example.ex: The judge described the crime as odious.
example.tran: 法官称这一罪行令人发指。

sentences.sentence: "consequences odious to those you govern"- Edmund Burke

auth_sentence.content: US President Barack Obama has described the bill as odious.

auth_sentence.content: To disoblige any friend of the family was odious to her.
auth_sentence.res_content: To disoblige any friend of the family was odious to her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To disoblige any friend of the family was odious to her.
